modName: Guan Yu Follower - The Three Kingdoms
summary: Adds Guan Yu from the Three Kingdoms as a follower at the Dragonbridge town inn.
descriptionHtml:
Guan Yu (Styled Yunchang) has always been my favorite character from the Three Kingdoms novel and it\'s many game and movie spin-offs. He was the \"Second Brother\" in a group of heroes that began the Kingdom of Shu in ancient China. He was known for his strength and intelligence, his strict loyalty, honor, and long flowing beard. I was inspired to make him a follower when I saw Bloodysunday\'s rendition of Lord Guan\'s legendary Green Dragon blade ( Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19383 )

Guan Yu can be recruited from the inn in Dragonbridge. He only carries a steel sword and no armor to start with. He is a 2-Handed fighter and likes heavy armor. He often uses a battle cry (shout) that varies with the version you download (V1.0 uses the \"Dismay\" shout, but after much playtesting I got tired of chasing down enemies and V1.1 replaces that with the \"Marked for Death\" shout). He will level with the player character. He does not require any special mods to use, so he should work with whatever mods you like best. He is BIG (Size slightly reduced in V1.1 to better balance things).

=========
Changelog:

IMPORTANT NOTE: Take all of his items before changing versions, or you will lose those items!

V1.1: NEW!!! Size reduced slightly due to height affecting damage output. Shout changed to \"Marked for Death\". Several 2H weapon perks added (2H axes/polearm axe mods are favored). Light Foot perk added. A few flavor items added to his starting inventory. Hunting bow respawn bug fixed.

V1.0: VERY large character, uses \"Dismay\" shout.


________________________________________
Mods I\'ve used to achieve the look in the photos:
(Individual mod sites may contain adult content)

Green Dragon Crescent Blade by Bloodysunday ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19383 )

Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul w/ Gennox Faces: ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488 )

Immersive Armors by hothtrooper44 ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733 )

Winter is Coming (cloaks) by Nivea ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486 )

The Art of Magicka by Zonzai and Kalell  ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1040

Dark Dragon Armor by thewolfpacisback ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20101 )
____________________________________
Graphics (and other) Mods I use and enjoy:
Ultimate Follower Overhaul
Climates of Tamriel
Skyrim HD 2k Textures
Skyrim Flora Overhaul
Lush Grass
Better Rocks and Mountains
The Official HD texture DLC

And too many others to name...

__________
Installation:

Unzip and place all files inside your Skyrim/Data folder.


___________________
Other Mods by Author:

Zhang Fei Follower - The Three Kingdoms ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20732 )

Lu Bu Follower - The Three Kingdoms ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21088 )
___________
Future Plans:
Lu Bu has enough requests that I will probably create him next, and then Zhuge Liang. After that, I will try and fulfill more requests. I will take a few days for each character at least, as I like to playtest them first.
author: Vegetaspank
